description:
Keyword research is a part of SEO that enables you to understand which specific keyword to target. Keyword research is the most important part of the SEO because without finding a perfect keyword you cannot rank your article. Keyword research is the process of finding what keyword is used by a specific user in a search engine and how many times that specific keyword is repeated by other users.
Keyword research consists of three parts:


Discover:
It means finding the best keywords related to your niche market. It is the process of finding as much keyword as possible related to your niche. There are a lot of online tools that allow you to generate the list of all possible keywords related to your niche.


Analyzing:
Analyzing your keyword means to find the competition of your keyword. It includes what is the search result of your keyword? What is the suggested bid of that keyword? A keyword with high competition will be very difficult to rank, so try to start with a keyword with low competition.


Analyzing your competition:
Before you start writing an article on your keyword it is important for you to analyze your competition. Analyzing your competition means to determine who is your competitor? Which things can help you to write even better article than your competitor in order to rank higher.


If you are searching for a course that can help you to learn each and every single thing related to keyword research than you are at right place because in this course we have included each and every single thing that is important for a perfect keyword research. In this course you will learn:
  • What is a niche market and how to find the best niche market?
  • How many tools are there for keyword research and which one is better for you to start with?
  •  What are the types of keywords?
  • Which is the best way to analyze the competition of your keyword?
  • How many keyword research tools are there in the market and which one is the best?
  • How to turn keywords into SEO-Optimized content.
It’s the only short summary of the course but the real part is of the course. I assure you in the end of this course you will be able to find the best keyword according to your niche market otherwise 100% money back guaranteed, so now what are you waiting for purchase the course sit back and watch it from the start.
title: Keyword Research: Learn The Most Leading Keyword Research
